column5: This contemporary Villa is a stunning property with lake and Hill Country views. Just minutes to the water and all of the Horseshoe Bay Resort's amenities, our guest have 4,800 sq. ft of interior space. This property offers 4 luxurious bedrooms, 4.5 baths, 9 beds, open living and dining areas, a pool, a full kitchen and bar, a 15' outdoor TV for families to have movie night on the lawn together, 2 fireplaces and a Chefs kitchen.
column8: Stunning Villa on Summit Rock Golf Course
